title: Can Subway giftcards from other countries be redeemed for RP?
body: A friend in Ireland was planning on buying me a Subway gift card to redeem for RP since I can't redeem an actual League gift card from there since it isn't NA. Would the Subway card be able to be redeemed or will there be an issue with that?

replies.body: It might still be specific to that region, if supported there.  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can look into this directly with you to find some options.  See you there!
Well, in that case, would there be any possible way to redeem an actual League card from Ireland on an NA server?
